name: Keep Shoveling
description:
Keep Shoveling is the first video game I made together with a friend, Huiripu. Your character is the locomotive driver in the wild west. Beside keeping the locomitve running, he has to defend the train against bandits.

We used the Ludum Dare 39 Game Jam and the theme Running Out of Power as an opportunity to develop our very first video game together. It was fun and we were able to learn alot.

The game was developed with the Godot Engine. Sounds and text font was downloaded by different sources. Textures was all made by ourselfs.

Thank you for give it a try. We would be happy about your feedback and appreciate that you take the time to try it.

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys for moving
  • SPACE to shovel coal in the locomotive and to shoot on top of the locomotive
  • Jumping and shooting are only enabled on top of the locomotive
